message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to us, reflecting its quality and the expertise behind it. Given its high value and unique features, I believe it could significantly benefit you. Would you like to explore this opportunity further?

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you place on your product, $15000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm very interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $12000.  Would you be willing to consider that price?
